name: NEO (itch) (teronk)
description:
Guide Neo back to her home planet through the portal of each level. Escape through the interdimensional hamster wheel to reach the top.

Controls:
Player 1 - AD to move left and right, W to jump
Player 2 - Left and right arrow to move, Up arrow to jump

The whole game was made in a weekend for Ludum Dare 47 with "Stuck in a loop" theme. 

Only 2 levels are currently available. You can play solo or against another player. Works best in full screen mode.

This is our first time joining a game jam :)

Art and theme song made by ZJ, programming by me.
Other SFX are from freesound.org
